Old Skool Rules

My “Old Skool” login will no longer work as of March 15th, says Flickr. I feel like I’m being kicked out – or up. Or something.

Anyone else get this same email?

Palm Brings Microsoft’s Direct Push Technology to Palm OS Based Treo Smartphones. Uh oh. Now do I nab a 680 while I await the iPhone?

27 January 2007

Kem Vows to Get Tattoo on Stage

Kem Meyer says she’ll get a tattoo on stage if 1,000 people show up for Innovate 2007, a conference her church is hosting. Guts right there, folks. Guts.

Wii - Known Incompatible Routers

It sucks when you bring home your brand new Nintendo Wii and discover your cable modem/router is listed on this page of known, incompatible routers.

Running from Camera

Running from Camera. “The rules are simple: I put the self-timer on 2 seconds, push the button and try to get as far from the camera as I can.” (Via Blankenship.)
